title: Ticket #2438: Modifying DAGman parameters at runtime
description: At today's (2 September 2011) meeting with Thomson lab, Miron thought it might be a good idea to allow condor to change parameters during its run (e.g., MAXIDLE). This would either be a socket to communicate directly with condor_dagman or a file that condor_dagman would check periodically for updates.
remarks: #2616 is a duplicate of this idea. I am abandoning this ticket.
